articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Watch astronauts give the International Space Station a power boost - CNN
articles.description: On Wednesday morning, NASA astronaut Shane Kimbrough and European Space Agency astronaut Thomas Pesquet will conduct a spacewalk to begin the installation of new solar arrays. The panels will help provide a power boost to the space station.

articles.title: Football: Record-breaking Ronaldo strikes late as Portugal sink Hungary - CNA
articles.description: Portugal skipper Cristiano Ronaldo celebrated becoming the first player to appear in five European Championships with a brace as they got their title defence off to a winning start with a 3-0 victory over a determined Hungary on Tuesday (Jun 15).

articles.title: Britain has Europe's WORST Covid outbreak as Indian variant sees nation overtake Spain - Daily Mail
articles.description: Statistics compiled by the Oxford University-based research platform Our World in Data revealed that 107.3 people per million in the UK have tested positive for the virus in the last seven days.
articles.content:

articles.description: Biden will stop over at EU headquarters en route to a NATO summit and meeting with President Vladimir Putin.
articles.content:

articles.author: Matias Grez and Kim Norgaard, CNN
articles.title: Denmark's Martin Braithwaite criticizes UEFA for resuming game following Christian Eriksen's collapse - CNN International
articles.description: Denmark striker Martin Braithwaite has criticized UEFA, European football's governing body, for forcing the players to play their Euro 2020 match against Finland on Saturday after teammate Christian Eriksen's collapse.
